A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars movie- worse then the prequels\, lack of depth character development and moronic plotlines that destroy the legacy of the hero of the original trilogy- Luke Skywalker. If you are expecting some answers to the questions raised in the force awakens you will be very disappointed. Rian Johnsons ego took over\, he wanted to create a new Star Wars which now resembles the Twilight series. His admission that he was not making the movie for the fans but for himself is quite telling- the Star Was franchise will make money but Disney have destroyed the magic that it once was and robbed us of the best memories from our childhood.
